item.description:
For details and more information on dockdogs & this sport, visit http://www.dockdogs.com/

Yes, you CAN try it with your dog! On-site registration begins at 8:00a, $30 to practice, which automatically enters you into a "Wave" (or class, per se), which basically means you are entered into the competition, grouped with dogs of similar experience, and given another chance to jump! ***I would suggest getting there by 7:30a instead of 8:00a if you'd like to practice with your dog(s)!***

Event Format
Outdoor Big Air®, Extreme Vertical™ & Speed Retrieve™

Online Pre-Registration Closes
August 5, 2012 11:45 pm EST (pre-registration is limited)

Pre-Registration Entry Fees
$25.00 / team per Big Air, Speed Retrieve Wave, or Extreme Vertical Competition (Pre-Reg Limited to 30 dogs per Big Air, 30 dogs for Speed Retrieve Waves, 15 dogs for Extreme Vertical, $25.00 for Iron Dog

On-Site Registration Entry Fees
$30.00 / team per Big Air, Speed Retrieve Wave, or Extreme Vertical Competition (Limited to a total of 40 dogs per Big Air, 40 dogs for Speed Retrieve Waves, 28 dogs for Extreme Vertical), $30.00 for Iron Dog


Event Schedule

Saturday August 11, 2012

Onsite Registration / Practice - 8:00 am
Big Air Wave # 1 - 9:00 am
Big Air Wave # 2 - 11:00 am
Big Air Wave # 3 - 1:00 pm
Extreme Vertical - 3:30 pm

Sunday August 12, 2012

Onsite Registration / Practice - 8:00 am
Speed Retrieve - 9:00 am
Big Air Wave # 4 - 11:00 am
Big Air Wave # 5 - 1:00 pm
Speed Retrieve Finals - 3:30 pm
Big Air Finals begin at 4:00 pm (Pro, Semi-Pro, & Amateur)


Venue Information

Event Contact E-mail: registration@dockdogs.com
Office Phone: 330.241.4975
Hotel 1 LaQuinta
Hotel 1 Info Use Group / Corporate Code: D0CKD and present your DockDogs Membership Card for a 10%! Pet Friendly! 24 Beaver St Milford, MA 01757 Phone: 1-508-478-8243 Fax: 1-508-634-9936
Hotel 1 Website http://goo.gl/maps/aIDC
Venue Directions: http://goo.gl/maps/TPsZ
Event Address: Mansfield Crossing 280 School Street Mansfield, MA
item.name: Dockdogs National Competition at Mansfield Crossing this weekend!
